articles.title: Electric for short trips, Hybrid for long ones
articles.author: Marysia Bellamy
articles.summary: Lexus introduces the NX450h+ Plug-in Hybrid. The NX450h+ Plug-in Hybrid is a product from Lexus.

articles.title: Nothing's new affordable smartphone packs in good specs, but you can't buy it
articles.author: Shikhar Mehrotra
articles.summary: Nothing has unveiled its first affordable smartphone, the Phone (3a) Lite. This new handset features the company's signature design and familiar specs, with a strategy to keep the price low. The Phone (3a) Lite serves as a cautious, cost-effective addition to Nothing's 2025 lineup.

articles.title: 33 Game-Changing Products So You Can Skip The FOMO
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The article features a curated selection of various products available for purchase online, including a stroller wagon, outdoor lights by Lumary, Alo sweatpants, a Yoto player, Mielle's Rosemary Mint strengthening oil, ChomChom pet hair remover, an OmieBox, Affresh washing machine tablets, a tube of Essence's Lash Princess mascara and many other new and popular items. The descriptions highlight the features and benefits of each product, often accompanied by user reviews and pricing information.

articles.title: This free launcher makes your Android look just like Windows XP, and it is brilliant
articles.author: Tashreef Shareef
articles.summary: An independent developer, gjovanovski, has introduced 'Windows Launcher,' an Android launcher designed to replicate the Windows XP experience. The launcher includes classic themes, icons, a Start menu, retro apps, and games. The launcher is available for download from GitHub.

articles.title: The CarExpert team's favourite reveals from the Tokyo motor show
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Honda is re-entering the compact market with a new product called the Super-One. This move signals Honda's commitment to experimentation and innovation in a segment that other brands are leaving.

articles.title: 26 Pieces Of Lingerie Under $50 That Look Expensive Without Breaking The Bank
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of new lingerie products, including matching lace sets, demi underwire bras, mesh thongs, and four-piece lingerie sets, emphasizing comfort, design, and unique features such as floral embroidery, rhinestone embellishments, and open-crotch designs. Additionally, the product range extends to include comfortable options like camisole pajama sets, seamless thongs, and lace boy shorts, catering to diverse preferences for both sexiness and comfort.

articles.title: Yes, You Can Run Windows 95 In Your Browser, And It's Glorious
articles.author: Briley Kenney
articles.summary: Microsoft launched Windows 95 on August 24, 1995, which was a significant upgrade over Windows 3.1. Now, an developer has created a tool to run Windows 95 in a browser, allowing users to experience the old operating system without installation, and offering access to various programs and games.

articles.title: Can doing laundry be fun? With these accessories it can be
articles.author: Georgie Gordon
articles.summary: LG offers the 'Truesteam Styler' steam closet, and Hisense provides the '8i' washer-dryer combo. These products cater to laundry room needs.

articles.title: HOME DEPOT PRODUCT OF THE WEEK 11-1-25
articles.author: Lonnie Hines Iii
articles.summary: Home Depot is featuring a 'Product of the week', suggesting the promotion or introduction of a specific product.

articles.title: $20,000 Robot Servant Comes With a Major Catch
articles.author: Joe Wilkins
articles.summary: Palo Alto-based startup 1X is launching the NEO robot, a bipedal machine designed for chore assistance, starting next year. The NEO robot is currently in preorder phase and is available for preorder with a $200 deposit. Customers can opt for either a $499 monthly subscription or a $20,000 one-time purchase.

articles.title: Turkey Trot Your Way To Wawa For A Taste Of The 'Gobbler' Thanksgiving Sub
articles.author: Robin Miller
articles.summary: Wawa is offering the Gobbler, a Thanksgiving-themed hoagie, featuring turkey, gravy, stuffing, and cranberry sauce on a soft roll. The Gobbler is available at all Wawa locations until December 1, 2025, for $9.09 plus tax and offers customizable options such as additional spreads and fillings.

articles.title: NIO Inc. Provides October 2025 Delivery Update  Nov. 1, 2025 15:30
org: The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited
articles.summary: NIO Inc. announced its October 2025 delivery results, reporting a record-high of 40,397 vehicles. The deliveries included vehicles from the NIO, ONVO, and FIREFLY brands. ONVO L90, the smart large-space flagship SUV, achieved over 10,000 monthly deliveries for three consecutive months since its launch in late July 2025.

articles.title: Reviewers Say These 33 Amazon Products Are "The Best"
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: The article introduces several new products. These include:  a retractable E.l.f. eyeliner, lightweight New Balance sneakers, a splash-proof shower lamp, a dog paw scrubber, a Scrubbing Bubbles cleaning stamp, stackable closet organizers, an in-shower hair protein treatment, moisturizing and exfoliating foot peeling spray, cold sore healing patches, Wet & Forget shower cleaner, a 2-in-1 knife and cutting board, a super small LED thumb light, a rapid egg cooker, fast-drying OPI nail polish, a pet hair remover, a vegan under-eye brightener, Eos body lotion, an automatic pet feeder, a Little Elf gift wrap cutter, saline nasal gel, disposable shower hair catchers, "flossing toothbrushes", an electric flosser, Miss Mouth's stain remover spray, a Tymo ceramic hair curler, an electric makeup brush cleaner and dryer, disposable dental guards, a window cleaning robot, a self-cleaning litter box, a liquid tartar remover, anti-stain freckle pens, a rainbow eyeshadow palette, extendable marshmallow roasting forks.

articles.title: Give your tumble dryer a break with Lidl's 2p-an-hour gadget this winter â€“ it's great for tackling mould too
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Silentnight Airmax 600 2L Dehumidifier for Â£49.99. The dehumidifier helps remove moisture, features a quiet sleep mode, and has a removable two-liter tank with automatic shutoff. It will be available starting November 9 and comes with a one-year warranty.

articles.title: Samsung & Nvidia: AI Powers Next-Gen Chip Factory
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is deploying 50,000 Nvidia GPUs to enhance chip manufacturing and create an 'AI Megafactory'. This collaboration aims to improve precision, reduce defects, and accelerate the manufacturing process of new Samsung's HBM4, which will be specifically designed for AI applications, while enhancing AI models for mobile devices and robotics.

articles.title: 35 TikTok Home Products That Are Great Investments
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights a selection of newly featured products, including the 'Dream Cooker' by Our Place, an aesthetically pleasing cooker with four modes: pressure cook, slow cook, sear and sautÃ©, and keep food warm. It also features the 'Shark Pet' cordless vacuum cleaner, that has a 40-minute runtime, so you can get your whole space taken care of, plus a removable hand vac with accessories.

articles.title: From Chaos to Clarity: How AI Design Tools Simplify Brand Creation
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: CapCut Web AI Design, powered by Seedream 4.0, is launched to simplify branding with AI. The design tool builds logos, ensures color consistency, cleans up photos, scales marketing materials, and maintains brand consistency across platforms. The key features are AI logo generator, transparent background maker, and workspace with intuitive editing.

articles.title: From Subscriptions To Systems: How SaaS Monetization Is Evolving In The AI Era
articles.author: Scott Woody
articles.summary: HubSpot now supports a hybrid monetization model, incorporating free tools, self-serve plans, and enterprise contracts to align pricing with delivered value. Salesforce introduces 'flex agreements,' allowing customers to trade seats for usage-based consumption, while HubSpot scales pricing mechanisms with customer needs, including usage-based credits for AI-powered tools. Snowflake simplifies its pricing structure and emphasizes early collaboration between pricing and product teams.

articles.title: NOVAK DJOKOVIC LAUNCHES COB FOODS - SORGHUM-BASED SNACKS - AS CO-FOUNDER AND LEAD INVESTOR
articles.author: Cob Foods
articles.summary: Cob, a new brand, launched its first product: a modern twist on popcorn featuring corn-free and gluten-free ingredients. The launch coincides with a seed round led by co-founder Novak Djokovic. Cob popcorn aims to provide a tasty, textured, and nutritious gluten-free snacking option.

articles.title: Enhance Engagement With Smart Signage Software
articles.author: Danny Jones
articles.summary: The article discusses Smart Signage Software, a technology that enables businesses to create dynamic visual experiences for stronger customer connections. It highlights features such as cloud-based platforms, interactive communication channels, and real-time data integration, which enhance customer experience and brand awareness. This software offers advantages like easy updates, customization options, and cost-effectiveness, making it an innovative communication solution.

articles.title: Just 30 Mildly Embarrassing Things To Buy Online To Avoid An Awkward Checkout Encounter
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Nizoral is offering an anti-dandruff shampoo with a 4.6/5-stars rating for providing relief for itchy scalps while fighting dandruff. Kerasal is introducing a fungal nail renewal formula that reduces discoloration and thickens nails. Squatty Potty is promoting a stool designed to help align the colon for easier and faster bowel movements.

articles.title: NEO the first 'consumer-ready humanoid robot' will do your chores. But what about privacy?
articles.author: Stewart Lewis
articles.summary: 1X, a California robotics company, has announced preorders for NEO, described as the 'world's first consumer-ready humanoid robot.' Priced at US$20,000, with shipments expected to begin in 2026, NEO is designed for household tasks and can be controlled via a mobile app or voice commands. The robot also features an 'expert mode' allowing remote supervision by a 1X employee for complex tasks.

articles.title: NEO the first 'consumer-ready humanoid robot' will do your chores
articles.author: Stewart Lewis
articles.summary: 1X has announced preorders for NEO, the world's first consumer-ready humanoid robot, expected to ship in 2026. Priced at $20,000 or $499/month, NEO is designed for household tasks and offers remote expert assistance, balancing functionality with privacy considerations. It has Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and 5G capabilities.

articles.title: Billboards Underwater: Reimagining Out-of-Home Ads in Surreal New Settings
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Dreamina introduces an AI photo generator that enables marketers to craft advertising campaigns for underwater billboards and urban aquariums. The platform also includes an AI logo generator, allowing brands to create aquatic logos that merge with sea creatures. Dreamina's tools facilitate the creation of immersive advertising experiences that blend seamlessly with underwater environments.

articles.title: 46 Useful Stocking Stuffers They'll Really Appreciate
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article presents a range of new product offerings from various companies.  ChapStick introduces a Holiday Gift Set with seasonal flavors, while Fly By Jing offers chili crisp to add a tingly kick to different meals. O'Keeffe's releases hand cream for dry, cracked hands.

articles.title: $50 off on your new OnePlus 15 in US, and $350 less than an iPhone 17 pro max? Read on to find out pre-order offers, release date, and specifications
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: OnePlus will release the OnePlus 15 in the United States on November 13. The OnePlus 15 features a 7,300mAh battery with 120W charging, an IP69K rating, and a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. Pre-order incentives include a $50 discount.

articles.title: $20K Home Robot: Is It Worth the Price & Hype?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: 1X has launched Neo, a $20,000 humanoid robot designed as a general-purpose home assistant.  It is also available via a $499 monthly subscription. Neo can perform tasks like folding laundry and bringing groceries, and features voice control via an LLM similar to ChatGPT, though current functionality relies heavily on remote operation, with full autonomy targeted for 2026.

articles.title: Durable Design & All-Day Battery Life
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The Xiaomi Pad 7 Pro Ultra exemplifies the latest tablet technology with up to 2TB of storage and a 20,000 mAh battery for extended use. This tablet, powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, represents the convergence of tablets and laptops, offering enhanced productivity and versatile performance for various tasks.

articles.title: Finding the Best AI Chatbot for WhatsApp in 2025
articles.summary: Kogents is offering customized AI chatbot solutions for WhatsApp. Kogents integrates agentic AI capabilities into their solutions, enabling proactive customer engagement. This helps businesses automate customer communication, improve efficiency, and increase customer satisfaction, with a focus on personalized communication and scalable service.

articles.title: NIO Inc. Provides October 2025 Delivery Update
articles.author: NIO Inc.
org: The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited
articles.summary: NIO Inc. announced its October 2025 delivery results, which included 40,397 vehicles. The deliveries consisted of vehicles from NIO, ONVO, and FIREFLY brands. The ONVO L90 achieved a new record with monthly deliveries exceeding 10,000 for three consecutive months since its official launch in late July 2025.

articles.title: Vanish launches: New double-strength spray for tough stain removal
articles.author: MAARIV ONLINE
articles.summary: Vanish launched a new double-strength spray designed for tough stain removal, effective on grease and oil stains.

articles.title: BLU G65L Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: BLU officially announced the G65L smartphone in the second quarter of 2025. The BLU G65L features a 6.7-inch display, a 50MP main camera, and is powered by a Unisoc Tiger T606 processor with 4GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage; it runs on Android 14 and is fueled by a 5000 mAh battery. The BLU G65L's lowest price is P7,626.57.

articles.title: ðŸŒ± Patch AM: Celebrate 60 years of community support in Golden
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile invested billions to improve their network. Ookla Speedtest reports T-Mobile as America's best mobile network. T-Mobile is supporting local communities.

articles.title: 12 Best Inexpensive Mattresses
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: Various mattresses are available from retailers like Amazon and Wayfair, including gel memory foam, hybrid, innerspring, and trifold options. These mattresses vary in firmness, material, and features like cooling gel, green tea infusion, and individually wrapped coils, with queen sizes ranging from $125 to $359.99.

articles.title: How I set up the fastest laundry service in the UK
articles.author: Rod Gilmour
articles.summary: Laundryheap launched an overnight express service in London in partnership with hotels. This service enables customers to have laundry collected by 10pm and delivered back by 8am, and it is billed as the fastest laundry service in the UK. The company has acquired six competitors, and expanded to Singapore, UAE and the US.

articles.title: This 3-Door First Generation Honda City Hatchback Launched 44 Years Ago Has Desis Saying â€˜Yeh Toh Mr Bean Ki Car Hain'
articles.author: Auto Desk
articles.summary: Honda launched the first generation Honda City as a three-door hatchback in Japan in 1981, equipped with a 1231 cc 4-cylinder engine. The development started in April 1978, and Honda sold 150,000 units in two years after its launch in November 1981.

articles.title: 30 Stocking Stuffers For Kids From Walmart
articles.author: Courtney Hayes
articles.summary: The article features a list of new or recently available toy and care items, from various companies. Including 5 Surprise axolotl toy, Hot Wheels car, Tom's of Maine watermelon toothpaste, Frozen toothbrush, Justice smartwatch, Barbie-inspired hair clip set, Spidey & Friends tumbler, metal Slinky, Polly Pocket x Elf toy, Larabar brownie bars and others. The article mentions the product name and its price.

articles.title: 'Ultimate' Â£46 Nivea gift set with 13 items slashed to Â£20 in Home Bargains
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Home Bargains is offering discounted gift sets including the Nivea Glow All Out Skincare Gift Set reduced to Â£19.99, the Nivea Softening Moments Of Joy Gift Set at Â£3.99, the REN Clean Skincare Gift Set at Â£39.99, the Nivea Men Ultimate Maxed Complete Collection Gift Set at Â£19.99, and the Dove Body Wash Trio Gift Set at Â£4.99. These sets feature a variety of skincare and beauty products, providing shoppers with bargain options for Christmas gifts.

articles.title: 'Pamper yourself' Â£46 Nivea gift set with 13 products only Â£20 at Home Bargains
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Home Bargains has reduced prices on various beauty gift sets, including the Nivea Glow All Out Skincare Gift Set (from Â£46 to Â£19.99), the Nivea Softening Moments Of Joy Gift Set (from Â£8 to Â£3.99), the REN Clean Skincare Gift Set (from Â£199.99 to Â£39.99), the Nivea Men Ultimate Maxed Complete Collection Gift Set (from Â£46 to Â£19.99), and the Dove Body Wash Trio Gift Set (from Â£12 to Â£4.99). These deals are available both online and in stores.

articles.title: Bumper Â£46 Nivea gift set with 13 products only Â£20 at Home Bargains
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Home Bargains is offering significant discounts on gift sets from Nivea, REN Clean Skincare, and Dove. The Nivea Glow All Out Skincare Gift Set is reduced from Â£46 to Â£19.99, the Nivea Softening Moments Of Joy Gift Set is down from Â£8 to Â£3.99, the REN Clean Skincare Gift Set is available for Â£39.99 from Â£199.99 and the Nivea Men Ultimate Maxed Complete Collection Gift Set from Â£46 to Â£19.99 and the Dove Body Wash Trio Gift Set - Favourites from Â£12 to Â£4.99.

articles.title: Hangry Moose in Worcester pub serves impressive burgers
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: Hangry Moose, a burger restaurant located within The Swan on New Street, is receiving positive customer reviews. Customers praise the burger quality and service, with many describing it as one of the best burgers they've had. Customers can try to win a burger at the restaurant by pressing a button to stop the time at 10 seconds.

articles.title: Body Care: The New Frontier For Luxury Fragrance And Skincare
articles.author: Bianca Salonga
articles.summary: Several companies have recently launched new body care products. Soft Services launched Software Update Performance Retinol Serum. Ursa Major introduced the Golden Hour Body Collection, including body butter and serum. Ember Wellness launched The Sheer Santal Collection featuring a Body Serum and Hydrating Body Oil. Le Labo introduced a body, hair, and face collection including the Basil Shower Set in 2017.

articles.title: LG partners with Nvidia on physical AI and digital twins
articles.author: Alimat Aliyeva
articles.summary: LG Electronics is collaborating with Nvidia to advance robotics technology through physical AI, utilizing Nvidia's Isaac GR00T model and robotics platforms. LG also aims to enhance smart factory solutions using digital twin technology and Nvidia's Omniverse platform, including integrating Omniverse with OpenUSD. Additionally, LG is seeking Nvidia certification for its coolant distribution unit for AI data centers and developing its AI model, Exaone, with Nvidia's support.

articles.title: What I learnt while trying the Rotimatic NEXT for a week
articles.author: Tushar Kanwar
articles.summary: Rotimatic NEXT, a roti-making kitchen gadget, launched in India in 2025. It promises to make perfect rotis and flatbreads. Other kitchen robots like Upliance 2.0 Smart Cooking Companion and WonderChef Chef Magic All-in-One Kitchen Robot combine functions such as stirring, sautÃ©ing, chopping, steaming, mixing and automatic frying into one compact machine.

articles.title: Kmart's $39 space-saving solution to common laundry issue: 'Seriously impressive'
articles.author: Marni Dixit
articles.summary: Kmart offers a '$39 Collapsible Pop Up Laundry Airer' designed for small spaces like apartments. This laundry airer features 16 rods for hanging clothes, includes pegs for smaller items, and folds into a slim cylinder for easy storage when not in use. The product has received positive feedback from shoppers on social media.

articles.title: Why are so many actors eating Kopiko in K-dramas? Inside Netflix's â€˜Genie, Make a Wish' and the global PPL boom
articles.author: Hankookilbo Koreatimes.Co.Kr
articles.summary: The Netflix series 'Genie, Make a Wish' features product placements from several companies including KT's 'Genie' speaker and 'Gi-ga-Genie' TV set-top box. The show also included foreign brands like Narwal and Jimmy Choo. Kopiko, an Indonesian coffee candy, utilized Korean dramas, including 'Genie, Make a Wish,' as a reverse-export advertising strategy, introducing its product to overseas markets.

articles.title: Zero-click AI is hereâ€”along with a sneaky danger
articles.author: Mala Bhargava
articles.summary: Several companies, including Google, Microsoft, Perplexity, and OpenAI, are introducing new agentic or AI-powered features and browsers.  These new AI based browsers like Perplexity's Comet and OpenAI's Atlas aim to automate tasks such as booking flights, returning items, drafting emails, and generating reports. The new features shift the web experience from a click-and-search model to an AI-powered conversational format, enabling autonomous task completion.

articles.title: ToriAI Poised to Transform Newsrooms with AI Innovation
articles.author: Life
org: Centre for Journalism Innovation and Development
articles.summary: The New Thought Media Support Foundation (NTMSF) launched ToriAI, an AI tool for Nigerian newsrooms designed to enhance efficiency and profitability. ToriAI includes 'Tori Storycards', which converts news stories into multiple formats and languages to grow audiences and diversify revenue streams. The platform was developed in partnership with Ogre.run.

articles.title: The "Delicious" New Limited-Edition Spread I've Eaten 5 Mornings in a Row (It's That Good)
articles.author: Alexandra Foster
articles.summary: Big Spoon Roasters launched a new seasonal nut butter called Sugar Plum Almond & Hazelnut Butter, inspired by the holiday season. It is made with ingredients like heirloom mission almonds, Oregon hazelnuts, organic maple syrup, organic cinnamon and cloves, Ugandan bourbon vanilla, and Jacobsen sea salt, and is studded with whole pieces of organic cashews, cranberries, and apricots. This limited-edition flavor is available on Big Spoon's website for $16.99 until December 31.

articles.title: New Land Cruiser 'FJ' Makes World Premiere
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Toyota Motor Corporation (Toyota) has unveiled the new Land Cruiser FJ. Toyota plans the Japan launch for around mid-2026.

articles.title: Scaling SaaS Monetization: How AI-Era Leaders Blend PLG And SLG
articles.author: Scott Woody
articles.summary: HubSpot, Zapier, and Temporal are implementing hybrid monetization models, blending Product-Led Growth (PLG) and Sales-Led Growth (SLG) to scale efficiently. These companies are focusing on packaging, governance, and systems to create a seamless customer journey where PLG and SLG reinforce each other, which helps transition to AI-powered features with flexible monetization.
